Posts.Content: hello I am 31 years old (female) and I am hoping that some one can help me with this while I wait for my Dr. appt. for the past couple of days I have been having some pain in my right breast last night was the worst as I felt around I found a hard painful lump right by the nipple area I also have notice that my nipple had been looking dry and scaly but didn't think any thing of it until I felt the lump... it seems as though it is it is smooth and maybe the size of a quarter I am scared and worried and can not find too much information on what this can be any advice would be greatly appreciated thanks.. oh and when touched it moves but not a lot if that helps and the pain is throbbing hurt to touch
Posts.Title: painful lump under right nipple
